summary: Experienced Deputy General Counsel with a demonstrated history of working in the telecommunications industry and other sectors (8 years in private practice and 7 years in-house). Skilled in Mergers & Acquisitions, Joint Ventures, Private Equity, Corporate Law, Corporate Governance and Commercial Contracts. Admitted to practice law in England and Wales and California, US,. Strong legal professional with a Master of Laws from New York University School of Law and bilingual in English and Russian.
